titleStmt.title: Ignorance and error reproved being an answer to some queries that one John Reynolds wrote to two of the people called Quakers / by Thomas Taylor.
titleStmt.author: Taylor, Thomas, 1618-1682.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and sold by T. Sowle ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Also appears as part of his Truth's innocency and simplicity, London, 1697.
